INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the plasma concentrations of ibrutinib due to decrease of its hepatic metabolism by the amiodarone
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Strict clinical monitoring and reduction of the dose of ibrutinib to 140 mg per day during the length of time these medications are administered together.
